s.text: The part about the underwear probably isn't true, but how can we be sure?
The hospitals recommend that the blood sample, dripped onto a special card, be stored by the parents in the above-mentioned places.
Nine Florida hospitals now offer to take blood samples from newborns, to help with prompt identification if the child is eventually murdered.
And of course by "merge" I mean form a single organization able to more efficiently serve the needs of all its constituents.)
